basics.name: Naël Pannetier
basics.label: Full Stack Developer
basics.summary: Involved and naturally curious with over 4 years of experience in web development. Strong ability of autonomy and a mindset of never giving up. Used to large data sets, skilled in PHP, Javascript, SQL, HTML/CSS and actively learning React framework.

work.name: TOPDATA
work.summary: Developed full-stack web applications using PHP (Symfony framework), JavaScript, and SQL.
highlights: Rest API’s creation, maintenance and redaction of documentation
Fixing bugs and adding features using JIRA for the ticketing
Using git versionning for keeping track of the code and easily team working
Development of big project for a client with an online shop : monthly subscription, Mail templating creation (API), Discount code creation (API)
Reducing time loading of pages using php logs and debugging tools
responsibilities: Deliver project on time with deadlines
Estimation of working hours needed for projects
Exchange directly with clients, sometimes in emergency, to discuss new features creation, upgrades, updates...
achievements: Mail templating Rest API developed with symfony : Send order number, user id,... -> Creates a XML with informations from the database (Name, order items, total paid, etc..)
Forgot password : Add the 'forget password' to the client website. Creation of a 1h token, send by mail and stored in database, controlled through Rest API
Creation of stored procedures : Control some steps in the buying process (Amount, delivery price, discounts, ...

Add new feature on the online shop Basket Subscription : Create a basket online and get the same every month (the 11th is free), with a all new interface to manage the subscription (register payment card, delete/stop subscription, etc..)

work.name: EMITY
work.summary: First experience in web development by contributing to front-end and back-end tasks, including creating interactive features using JavaScript libraries.
achievements: Creation of a digital restaurant menu : Using turn.js
Add facebook api's features : adding on the website of the company facebook publications and comments

projects.name: Personal Portfolio
projects.description: A personal portfolio website to showcase my projects and skills.
highlights: Built with React and Tailwind CSS
Includes a blog and contact form
